 */export var UPDATE_SHIPPING_FIELDS='UPDATE_SHIPPING_FIELDS';export var UPDATE_EMAIL='UPDATE_EMAIL';export var UPDATE_EMAIL_AVAILABLE='UPDATE_EMAIL_AVAILABLE';/** @namespace Store/Checkout/Action/updateShippingFields */export var updateShippingFields=middleware(function(shippingFields){return{type:UPDATE_SHIPPING_FIELDS,shippingFields:shippingFields};},"Store/Checkout/Action/updateShippingFields");/** @namespace Store/Checkout/Action/updateEmail */export var updateEmail=middleware(function(email){return{type:UPDATE_EMAIL,email:email};},"Store/Checkout/Action/updateEmail");/** @namespace Store/Checkout/Action/updateEmailAvailable */export var updateEmailAvailable=middleware(function(isEmailAvailable){return{type:UPDATE_EMAIL_AVAILABLE,isEmailAvailable:isEmailAvailable};},"Store/Checkout/Action/updateEmailAvailable");
